summary: Project to create a retro game emulator.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- TV/CRT frame overlay with bezel, subtle reflections, and screen cutout transparency (crt-tv-frame.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a retro game emulator single-page app that lets a user load a ROM locally in the browser, start/stop gameplay, and view the emulator output in a dedicated play screen.
Add input controls for gameplay: map keyboard inputs to emulator buttons and provide an on-screen controller for touch devices.
Implement a basic game library UI that lists previously loaded ROMs (by name/metadata derived locally), allows launching a game, and allows removing an entry from the list.
Add emulator settings UI for at least: audio on/off, volume, video scaling mode (fit vs integer/nearest), and a way to remap controls.
Add save/load state functionality: allow creating named save states and loading them later, with optional syncing to the backend for logged-in users.
Add authenticated UX using Internet Identity: show sign-in/sign-out controls, and clearly indicate when cloud sync (backend saves) is enabled.
Apply a cohesive retro-inspired visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a distinct style suitable for a game emulator UI (avoid blue/purple as primary colors).
Add basic in-app help: a Help/About panel that explains supported ROM loading, controls, save states (local vs cloud), and includes a disclaimer that users must own the ROMs they load.
Add generated static image assets for branding and UI polish, and render them in the app UI from frontend/public/assets/generated.

Add a TV/CRT-style display element to the emulator area on the Play screen by wrapping the existing <canvas> display in a TV frame/overlay, while keeping all current behaviors (ROM upload overlay, error overlay, canvas sizing) working.
Add the generated TV/CRT frame image asset to the app as a static file under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the Play screen emulator display container.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a retro game emulator application.
Implement backend persistence for authenticated users: store per-user game entries (metadata only) and per-user per-game save states (binary blobs) with create/list/delete operations.
Add a TV/CRT-style display element (e.g., TV frame/overlay) to the emulator play screen UI.

projectName: Retro game emulator web app with ROM upload, play UI, and cloud save states
